myservice.discription: Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design; interface design; authoring, including standardised code and proprietary software; user experience design; and search engine optimization.
A hybrid application (hybrid app) is one that combines elements of both native and Web applications. Native applications are developed for a specific platform and installed on a computing device.

A newsletter is a printed report containing news of the activities of a business or an organization that is sent by mail regularly to all its members, customers, employees or people, who are interested in. Newsletters generally contain one main topic of interest to its recipients.

A native mobile app is a smartphone application that is coded in a specific programming language, such as Objective C for iOS or Java for Android operating systems. Native mobile apps provide fast performance and a high degree of reliability.
A Web application (Web app) is an application program that is stored on a remote server and delivered over the Internet through a browser interface.

Responsive web design is an approach to web design that makes web pages render well on a variety of devices and window or screen sizes. Recent work also considers the viewer proximity as part of the viewing context as an extension for RWD.

responsibilities: Designed websites, portals and large scale web applications formultiple clients
Coded user-customizable applications to convert raw data from design engine to easily understandable graphical formats

Increased web traffic 95% by improving navigation, creating dynamic media sections and adding social media plugins
Coordinated with project managers across multiple initiatives to align development timeline's, plan testing and work with clientrepresentatives
Evaluated software development project plans and recommended adjustments

Established clear system operational specifications and formulated highly specific software requirements resulting in 100%
